name: Kirby Ultra Super Deluxe
description:
Kirby Ultra Super Deluxe is an arcade game developed by HAL Laboratory. It was originally released in 2008. It was published by Nintendo.
You can play Kirby Ultra Super Deluxe on Nintendo DS.
Kensuke Tanabe, Satoru Iwata and Shigeru Miyamoto produced the game. It was directed by Masahiro Sakurai. It was scored by Jun Ishikawa.
